1553350.name: 30XX Original Soundtrack
1553350.description:
This is the soundtrack to 30XX!

It contains all 76 tracks from the game and the Editor together, including all the variant themes, boss themes, victory themes, and other music in-game, plus a bunch of never-before-heard original concepts, remixes, and demos!

This OST has been updated for 30XX's 1.0 release, and now contains all the game's tracks (plus a bunch more!).
